post.body: cuz nobody's feelin' it this year...economy, fam-fabulous times, etc.
sounds like my meal...thai style xmas dinner w/a salad...good, yet anything but ordinary
ah, well...such is life! Glad ur getting out. ;-)
said I wanna see the pic too :-)
oops, that last one was for u of course
wanna see the picture too! ;-)
are u sure about that, think of all the xmas movies where everything goes wrong/weird, eh?
aw, man! I wanna come visit too. you should message me your number
Colorado Springs w the family for xmas, u?
amen sista! :-)
when all else fails, try wine.
is it really xmas eve? really?
waiting for dinner and hopefully Tara's arrival
feeling really sleepy, who needs to be wake? not me
I am totally craving eggs! damn you brunch!
feeling like crap for having the worst eating habits ever - according to some.
made it in w only some bad a/p food to cause some minor grief
Just landed in phoenix for a quick connect to colorado springs...
thinking I've somehow made it to the level of "Will drinking" w/o even knowing it...I apologize for the texting last night :-S
Thinkin an open bar is seriously the best xmas predsent ever! Thank u xmission(!!
